column1: Uchi////Uchi is my favorite Houston restaurant. They are expensive
column2: but completely worth it. Their sushi is always fresh and they have unique dishes. After trying their other branches in Austin and Dallas
column3: this location is the best. They have an intimate atmosphere
column5: and amazing food. While they offer hot and cold dishes
column6: we prefer to order off their daily specials (which is printed every day) and look for new seafood we haven't tried. One of the must-have's is their foie gras
column7: it's one of my boyfriends favorite foods and uchi does an amazing job of it.
